title: Faith's first time
content:
Faith begun her menstruation while at school. It was very embarrassing for her. She narrates, "It happened in class with all my classmates around. I stood up to go to the toilet. My friend, pulled me down and said I should sit down quickly." 

"Your uniform has a red patch," my friend whisphered. 

"When I realised that I had stained my yellow uniform, I wanted the ground to swallow me there and then. Oh, it was such a terrible experience. I was so embarrassed. My friends helped me, but I spent the whole week at home. I could not bring myself to come to school and face my classmates. I thought the whole school knew. It took a while but I know now, that it is normal. I learnt how to count my days and keep track on the calendar so that it does not happen again. I always pack a pad and extra party, just in case  but I am now always ready. Fellow girls, be prepared, always!
